ReportDesign.DesignDesc: PFF filter for saved query Projects... to show project members for the selected project ID.

Query.QueryDesc: Find projects by project id, project name, object name etc
Query.QueryClause: SELECT qid FROM TC_Project WHERE "project_id" = "${ProjectID = }" AND "project_name" = "${ProjectName = }" AND "project_desc" = "${ProjectDescription = }" AND "is_active" = "${Active = }" AND "owning_user.user_id" = "${ProjectOwningUser = $USERID}" AND "owning_group.name" = "${ProjectOwningGroup = $GROUP}" AND "WorkspaceObject<-project_list.object_name" = "${Name = }" AND "WorkspaceObject<-project_list.object_desc" = "${Description = }" AND "WorkspaceObject<-project_list.object_type" = "${Type = }" AND "WorkspaceObject<-project_list.owning_user.user_id" = "${OwningUser = }" AND "WorkspaceObject<-project_list.owning_group.name" = "${OwningGroup = }"

Pff.PffDesc: PFF filter for saved query Projects... to show project members for the selected project ID.
Pff.PffClause: TC_Project.project_id;Project ID, TC_Project.project_name;Project Name, TC_Project.project_team.project_members.user.user_id;User ID, TC_Project.project_team.project_members.user.user_name;User Name, TC_Project.project_team.project_members.role.role_name;Role in Project
